statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeeSurveyData;
SELECT employee_id, survey_response FROM EmployeeSurveyData WHERE survey_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT survey_response FROM EmployeeSurveyData WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSurveyData ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSurveyData WHERE survey_response LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY employee_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSurveyData ORDER BY survey_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT employee_id, survey_response FROM EmployeeSurveyData WHERE survey_response LIKE '%positive%'
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSurveyData WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT survey_date, COUNT(employee_id) AS total_responses FROM EmployeeSurveyData GROUP BY survey_date ORDER BY total_responses DESC
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSurveyData ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM employee_surveys WHERE employee_id = 100;
SELECT survey_id, survey_date, satisfaction_rating FROM employee_surveys WHERE survey_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY satisfaction_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM survey_results WHERE survey_id = 1 ORDER BY result_id ASC;
SELECT question, answer FROM survey_results WHERE survey_id = 2 AND answer LIKE '%good%';
SELECT survey_id, COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM survey_results GROUP BY survey_id HAVING total_responses > 5 ORDER BY total_responses DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_surveys;
SELECT survey_id, employee_id, survey_date FROM employee_surveys WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3;
SELECT survey_id, satisfaction_rating, COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM employee_surveys GROUP BY survey_id HAVING total_responses > 1;
SELECT e.employee_id, e.survey_date, r.question, r.answer FROM employee_surveys e JOIN survey_results r ON e.survey_id = r.survey_id;
SELECT survey_id, employee_id, survey_date, satisfaction_rating, feedback FROM employee_surveys WHERE satisfaction_rating < 3;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee WHERE manager_id = 100;
SELECT survey_name, survey_date FROM Survey ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponse WHERE response_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT employee_id, response FROM SurveyResponse WHERE survey_id = 1 AND response LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT * FROM Employee WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT survey_date, survey_name FROM Survey WHERE survey_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT survey_name, COUNT(response_id) AS response_count FROM SurveyResponse GROUP BY survey_name;
SELECT e.employee_name, s.survey_name FROM Employee e INNER JOIN SurveyResponse sr ON e.employee_id = sr.employee_id INNER JOIN Survey s ON sr.survey_id = s.survey_id;
SELECT * FROM Employee ORDER BY manager_id DESC, employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_survey_data ORDER BY survey_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT employee_name, department_id FROM employee WHERE department_id = 2
SELECT department_name FROM department WHERE department_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT survey_date, satisfaction_score FROM employee_survey_data WHERE satisfaction_score > 3 ORDER BY survey_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT question_text FROM survey_question
SELECT * FROM employee_survey_data ORDER BY survey_date DESC, satisfaction_score ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT employee_name, department_name FROM employee e JOIN department d ON e.department_id = d.department_id WHERE e.department_id = 2
SELECT survey_id, COUNT(employee_id) AS employee_count FROM employee_survey_data GROUP BY survey_id ORDER BY employee_count DESC
SELECT MAX(satisfaction_score) AS max_satisfaction_score FROM employee_survey_data WHERE department_id = 1
SELECT DISTINCT question_text FROM survey_question
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSurveys ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM Employees WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT question_text, question_category FROM SurveyQuestions WHERE question_category = 'Employee Satisfaction';
SELECT response_text, response_rating FROM SurveyResponses WHERE survey_id = 10 ORDER BY response_rating DESC;
SELECT survey_id, total_responses, average_rating FROM SurveyAnalytics WHERE total_responses > 50;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeSurveys;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, department FROM Employees ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT survey_date, survey_responses FROM EmployeeSurveys WHERE survey_id = 10;
SELECT sq.question_text, sr.response_text, sr.response_rating FROM SurveyQuestions sq JOIN SurveyResponses sr ON sq.question_id = sr.question_id;

SELECT ss.survey_id, sa.total_responses, sa.average_rating FROM SurveyAnalytics sa JOIN EmployeeSurveys ss ON sa.survey_id = ss.survey_id WHERE sa.total_responses > 50 ORDER BY sa.average_rating DESC;
